channel.title: API on CEO Playbook
channel.description: Recent content in API on CEO Playbook

item.title: xpanse
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: API-first platform that standardizes and aggregates financial services, allowing developers, banks, and fintechs to launch banking, identity, and payment products with a single integration.

item.title: Assured
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Insurtech platform that aggregates protection products from top carriers like Chubb, PGA Sompo, and Etiqa, allowing any digital channel to embed insurance coverage via a single API.
